code: import React,{useState}from'react';import ToDoApp from'./ToDoApp';import RemoveToDoItems from'./RemoveToDoItems';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MainToDoItems(){const[listToDo,setListToDo]=useState([]);let addToDoList=inputText=>{if(inputText!=="")setListToDo([...listToDo,inputText]);};const deleteListItem=key=>{let newListItem=[...listToDo];listToDo.splice(key,1);setListToDo([...listToDo]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ToDoApp,{addToDoList:addToDoList}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:"New Todo List"}),listToDo.map((item,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RemoveToDoItems,{index:i,item:item,deleteItem:deleteListItem},i);})]});}export default MainToDoItems;
